definition: to damage by scratching/to gash/to lacerate
to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character

sentences.english: Why on earth don’t they get totally scratched up?
sentences.chinese: 那到底爲什麼它們沒有劃傷呢？

sentences.english: The gloves are made of lambswool which means that they won’t scratch your display.
sentences.chinese: 此手套用羔羊毛製作，所以不會劃傷顯示屏。

sentences.english: Two see hardness, scratch resistance, protective paint for wood work.
sentences.chinese: 二看硬度，耐劃傷，保護木器漆歷久彌新。

sentences.english: A sharp blade is likely to nick the skin and draw blood.
sentences.chinese: 鋒利的刀刃可能會劃傷皮膚，導致出血。

sentences.english: Rolling material support ball is set, to minimize fish tail with sheet bar and to reduce frictional resistance.
sentences.chinese: 滾動託料球，減少板料劃傷，並可減少摩擦阻力。

sentences.english: Small pads along the bottom keep from scratching your toilet seat.
sentences.chinese: 坐墊的底部還帶有小墊片，以免劃傷你的坐廁。

sentences.english: I want to buy a wooden ladle which will not scratch an electric cooker.
sentences.chinese: 我想買個木製的飯勺，盛飯時不會劃傷電飯鍋。

sentences.english: There is scuffing and scratching on the bottom surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 有劃傷和底部表面劃傷。

sentences.english: There is scuffing and scratching on the bottom surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 有劃傷和底部表面劃傷。

sentences.english: Objective To reproduce a scratch-wound model in cultured rat astrocytes (AST).
sentences.chinese: 目的複製體外培養大鼠星形膠質細胞劃傷模型。

sentences.english: The pressure bar of a lead briquetting machine, imported from German, was seriously scratched during its service.
sentences.chinese: 從德國進口的壓鉛機壓桿在使用中表面嚴重劃傷。

sentences.english: The bezel of the watch, being polished stainless steel, is very strong, but scratches easily.
sentences.chinese: 表鏡邊框，是不鏽鋼拋光的，很堅固，但很容易劃傷。

sentences.english: The lens is easy to scratch or smudge.
sentences.chinese: 該鏡頭很容易劃傷或弄髒。

sentences.english: How does the cut inside cheeper ear do?
He dropped a bottle in the kitchen and nicked himself on broken glass.
sentences.chinese: 他在廚房不小心打碎了一個瓶子，被碎玻璃片劃傷了。

sentences.english: He gashed his arm on a piece of broken glass.
sentences.chinese: 被破裂的玻璃劃傷了臉。

definition: to abrade/to scrape/to chafe/to graze/abrasion/friction burn/scratch
a burn (tissue damage from heat, chemicals etc)/to burn (the skin etc)/(fig.) (of anger, jealousy etc) to hurt (sb)
